Rocio is the president of this committee. She makes a living making and selling flower arrangements. She is a very hardworking person who gives everything to her family and always tries to help them. Aside from this, she also always tries to motivate her fellow members to continue fighting so that they can help and grow in their business ventures.

Rocio has applied for a loan to buy fabric, wire, and baskets to make handmade flower arrangements. She will sell them wholesale.

loans.use: to buy fabric, wire, and baskets for flower arrangements.

loans.name: Solanye Sarita

texts.es:
Solanye es una joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante, trabaja como ayudante de cocina en una pollería de su ciudad, lo que le permite tner ingresos para poder salir adelante ya que ella se encuentra estudiando en una universidad de su ciudad la carerra de economía y poder solventar los gastos de su hogar, sobre todo porque es madre de un pequeño de 4 ños a la cual quiere mucho y es su motivo para salir adelante.

Solanye esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que graciasa su ayuda ella podrá solventar los gastos para la obtención de su bachiller y de esta manera poder obtener un mejor empleo que le permitaseguir esforzándose y hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Obtener su título y tener un mejor empleo para apoyar a su hijo”.
texts.en:
Solanye is a young woman with a great desire to succeed. She works in the kitchen of a poulterer's in her city, which gives her an income to get ahead as  she is studying economics in a university in her city and needs to cover her household expenses and, in particular, because she is the mother of a 4 year old little boy who she loves very much and who is her reason to succeed. 
Solanye is grateful to the Kiva lenders as, thanks to their help, she will be able to cover her expenses to get her bachelor's degree and, as a result, will be able to get a better job that will enable her to keep striving and to realize her greatest dream: to get her degree and to have a better job to support her son.

loans.use: to get her bachelor's degree

loans.name: Porvenir 1 Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama Porvenir 1, lleva este nombre ya que todas las integrantes se unieron en busca del porvenir de sus familias, con el trabajo en conjunto de todas. Además están dentro de programa de eliminación de la pobreza.
Una de ellas es la Sra. Miryan quien en su última encuesta mostro un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, lo que quiere decir que en muchos de los indicadores de la encuesta está en marcador bajo. Entre el trabajo que ella hace cuenta que se dedica a vender comidas rápidas que ella misma hace, y que después sale a vender ella misma de manera ambulante. Ella es una mujer muy emprendedora, que está luchando por salir adelante.
La Sra. Myrian  pide este préstamo para poder comprar carnes, condimentos, pollo, jamón, queso y demás, para poder seguir haciendo sus comidas, y así día a día poder luchar por ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
This group is called Porvenir 1. It has this name because all the members are united in searching for a good future (porvenir) for their families by working together. They are also part of a poverty elimination program. 
Miryan is one of the members and, in the last evaluation, was found to be at level one for poverty, which is to say that in many of the evaluation categories she had a low score. She works selling fast food that she also makes and then sells herself in the street. She is an enterprising woman who is fighting to get ahead. 
Myrian is requesting this loan to buy meat, condiments, chicken, ham, cheese, and more so that she can keep making her meals and so to be able to fight to help her family every day.

loans.use: to buy meat, condiments, chicken, ham, cheese, and more to make meals to sell.

loans.name: İngilab

texts.en:
Ingilab and his wife have been married for eight years and have two children. One of them is a 7-year-old son (who attends first class), and the other child is a 4-year-old daughter. Ingilab’s wife, a housewife, does not work on the incoming business because she is taking care of her children.

The family is living in the Baki region, but they have been IDP's from their home (Fazuli City) for the past twenty years. Ingilab is a 36-year-old man who is a parquet master. He has been in this business for 11 years. Today he wants to support his business, and he has applied for a 1,300 AZN loan to buy a new apparatus. This will replace his broken device. He is thankful to Kiva and all lenders for their help.

loans.use: for buy a new apparatus to replace his broken device.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy bananas, apples, pineapples, and more.

loans.name: Tajy Poty Group

texts.es:
El grupo Tajy Poty  está trabajando de manera conjunta hace cuatro ciclos, es un grupo que tiene las El grupo Tajy Poty  está trabajando de manera conjunta hace cuatro ciclos, es un grupo que tiene las esperanzas puestas de que por medio de las capacitaciones irán mejorando.
Podemos destacar a la  Sra. Marciana quien través del esfuerzo, el trabajo continuo y las aplicaciones de los comportamientos vitales de una mujer exitosa, ella se encuentra mejorando su situación de pobreza. Ella cuenta que se dedica al macate (venta ambulante) y es una de las bases primordiales con lo que lucha para mejorar la vida de su familia. Es una señora muy activa y luchadora, quien busca siempre  dar lo mejor a su familia.
La Sra. Marciana solicita  este préstamo para la compra de calzados, prendas y demás productos  para la venta, lo que le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The Tajy Poty Group has been working together for four cycles. This group hopes that they will continue to improve through their training.

Marciana is a member of this group. Through her effort, continuous work and applying the habits of a successful woman, she is improving her situation of poverty. She is a traveling saleswoman who fights to improve her family's life through her work. She is a very active and fighting woman who always seeks to provide the best for her family.

Marciana has applied for this loan to buy footwear, clothing, and other products to sell. This will help her to improve her income.

loans.use: to buy footwear, clothing, and other products to sell.

loans.name: Kuña Guapa Group

texts.es:
El grupo de mujeres emprendedoras llamado Kuña Guapa está en su ciclo número uno, está empezando a trabajar y casi todas tienen actividades productivas y donde todas se ayudan por salir adelante. 
La señora  María es miembro de este grupo, ella se dedica a la venta de minutas que ella hace y que luego sale a vender de manera ambulante.
Con el préstamo que ella pide es para comprar los insumos que necesita para poder seguir trabajando en su venta de comidas como lo viene haciendo, como ser verduras, condimentos, y demás. Agradece por la oportunidad que están recibiendo de seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
The Kuña Guapa Group, made up of female entrepreneurs, is in its first cycle. The group is starting to work together and nearly all of the members have productive business activities. They help each other to move forward.

María is a member of this group. She makes a living selling fast food, which she makes and sells as a traveling saleswoman.

She will use this loan to buy ingredients which she needs to continue making and selling food, such as vegetables, condiments, and other items. She is grateful for this opportunity which her group is receiving to continue working.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, condiments, and other items.

loans.name: Sandy Diana

texts.es:
Sandy es una joven de 26 años de edad, la cual ha atravesado por momentos difíciles, sobre todo por la pérdida de sus padres, lo cual fue muy doloroso para ella y sobre todo porque era muy pequeña. Afortunadamente una de sus tías, la apoyado mucho y sobre todo le ha brindado mucho amor y cariño, es por ello que cada día Sandy se esfuerza mucho para salir adelante, tal es así que ella trabaja apoyando a su tía en la atención de una pequeña tienda y en la venta e golosinas a las afueras de un colegio de su ciudad, y por las tardes acude a su centro de estudios, ya que ella actualmente estudia la carrera de administración de empresas.

Sandy está muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar solventar los gastos de su mensualidad y materiales de estudio, con lo cual la ayudara mucho par poder desempeñarse mejor, así ella seguirá luchando y sobre todo seguirá esforzándose en busca de hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Terminar su carrera y ser una gran profesional”.
texts.en:
Sandy is a young woman of 26 years of age who has been through some difficult times, particularly the loss of her parents which was very painful for her, above all because she was very small. Fortunately, one of her aunts supported her greatly and offered her a lot of love and care. This is why Sandy strives to get ahead every day and why she works to help her aunt in her little store and also selling candy outside a school in the city. In the afternoons, so goes to college, where she is currently studying for her business degree.
Sandy is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because, thanks to the help that they have offered her , she will be able to pay her tuition and materials expenses for college which will help her to perform better. In this way, she will keep fighting and, above all, keep striving to make her greatest dream reality: to finish her degree and be a professional.

loans.use: for college expenses (tuition and materials)

loans.name: Flaviano

texts.en:
Flaviano works hard to support her family. On November 8, 2013, her business and home were wiped out by super typhoon Haiyan.

She has restarted her business and is now requesting a PHP 9,500 housing loan through NWTF. It will be used to purchase building materials and to pay for construction labor so she could build a house for her family. With your help she will be able to rebuild her devastated life sooner.

In the future, Flaviano would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and to pay for construction labor.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.en:
Margarita is a 59-year-old married woman with one child in school. Margarita works very hard to provide for them.

Margarita's business and family home were destroyed by super typhoon Haiyan, which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. Margarita has restarted her business and now needs to provide her family with safe shelter.

Margarita has taken a PHP 10,000 housing loan through NWTF to purchase materials to rebuild her family home. She is using this loan to purchase building materials and to pay for construction labor.

Margarita is committed to rebuilding her devastated life and, in the future, she would like to save enough to build a house for her family.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and to pay for construction labor.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en:
Teresa is a 45-year-old married woman with 12 children, 9 of whom are in school. She and her family survived super typhoon Haiyan, which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. However, her business and family home were wiped out.

Teresa is taking out a 10,000 PHP housing loan to purchase building materials and to pay for construction labor to build a house for her family. Teresa has been an NWTF borrower since 2012. She plans to recover through her general store business.

With your help, Teresa can rebuild her house and rebound from the devastation of super typhoon Haiyan. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and to pay for construction labor.

loans.name: Generose

texts.en:
Generose is 37 years old and married with three children who are in school; Generose works very hard to provide for them.

Generose's business and family home was destroyed by Super Typhoon Haiyan, which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. Generose has restarted her business and now needs to provide her family with a safe shelter.

Generose has taken a PHP 8,000 housing loan through NWTF to purchase materials to rebuild her family home. She is using this loan to purchase building materials and to pay for construction labor costs.

Generose is committed to rebuilding her devastated life, and in the future she would like to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and to pay for construction labor costs

loans.name: Florida

texts.en:
Florida works hard to support her family. On November 8, 2013, her business and home were wiped out by super typhoon Haiyan. She has restarted her business and is now requesting a PHP 9,500 housing loan through NWTF. It will be used to purchase building materials and to pay for construction labor so she could build a house for her family. With your help she will be able to rebuild her devastated life sooner.

In the future, Florida would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and to pay for construction labor.

loans.name: Marie

texts.en:
Marie is a 19-year-old married woman with two children. She and her family survived super typhoon Haiyan, which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. However, her business and family home were wiped out.

Marie is taking out a 9,000 PHP housing loan to purchase building materials and to pay for construction labor to build a house for her family. Marie has been an NWTF borrower since 2013. She plans to recover through her general store business.

With your help, Marie can rebuild her house and rebound from the devastation of super typhoon Haiyan. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and to pay for construction labor.

loans.name: Anna Liza

texts.en:
Anna Liza is 43 years old and married with three children who are in school; Anna Liza works very hard to provide for them.

Anna Liza's business and family home were destroyed by Super Typhoon Haiyan, which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. Anna Liza has restarted her business and now needs to provide her family with a safe shelter.

Anna Liza has taken a PHP 10,000 housing loan through NWTF to purchase materials to rebuild her family home. She is using this loan to purchase building materials and to pay for construction labor costs.

Anna Liza is committed to rebuilding her devastated life, and in future she would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and to pay for construction labor costs

loans.name: Romina

texts.es:
Romina es estudiante del tercer año de la carrera de Licenciatura en Kinesiologia y Fisioterapia. A la vez que estudia, también trabaja  en la peluquería de su hermana realizando masajes de recuperación física y fisioterapias.
Vive con su mama y hermana. Su meta futura es poder montar su propio consultorio  y contar con pacientes que confíen en  la calidad de su trabajo. Con este préstamo estaría abonando la matricula del año lectivo y también  realizará la compra de camillas y aparatos específicos para realizar sus prácticas de Fisioterapia requeridos por la Universidad.
texts.en:
Romina is a student in her third year of college studying Kinesiology and Physical Therapy.  At the same time that she studies she also works at a beauty salon owned by her sister where she offers massages for physical recuperation and physical therapy.  

She lives with her mother and sister.  Her future goal is to be able to start her own practice and to count on patients who trust the quality of her work.  With this loan she will pay a year of tuition and she will also purchase stretchers and other specific items required in order to complete her interships in Physical Therapy required by the University.

loans.use: to pay tuition and to purchase stretchers and other items for physical therapy.

loans.name: Angel

texts.es:
Angel esta estudiando la carrera de medicina, comenta que es una carrera muy sacrificada y por sobre todo difícil, pero que se esta dedicando para poder ser un buen profesional.
Comenta que tiene como meta montar su propia Clínica dentro de la ciudad, y así ayudar a mucha gente su ciudad.  Hay muchas personas que necesitan de atención en su salud y es eso lo que le inspira a seguir luchando.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de la universidad, como también poder pagar sus cuotas de transporte, lo que le permitirá seguir luchando por su objetivo.
texts.en:
Angel is studying for a degree in Medicine.  He comments that this field of studies takes great sacrifice and that above all it is very hard.  However, he is dedicated to his studies because he wants to be a good professional.  

He comments that his goal is to open his own clinic within the city, and thereby help many people in his town.  There are many people who need medical care and that is what inspires him to continue working hard.   

He is asking for this loan in order to pay for his university tuition, as well as to pay for transportation, which will allow him to continue striving for his goal.

loans.use: To pay university tuition and to cover transportation expenses.

loans.name: Clarita

texts.en:
Clarita is 47 years old and married with four children.  With three children in school, Clarita works very hard to provide for them.

Clarita's business and family home were destroyed by Super Typhoon Haiyan which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. Clarita has restarted her business and now needs to provide her family with a safe shelter.

Clarita has taken a PHP 5,500 housing loan through NWTF to purchase materials to rebuild her family home. She is using this loan to purchase building materials and to pay for construction labor costs.

Clarita is committed to rebuilding her devastated life, and in the future she would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and to pay for construction labor costs

loans.name: Elena

texts.en:
Elena is 40 years old, married and has five children. Elena is married and has two children who are still in school.

She and her family survived Super Typhoon Haiyan which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013, but her business and family home were wiped out. 

Elena is taking out a housing loan amounting to PHP 10,000 to purchase building materials and to pay for construction labor costs to build a house for her family. 

Elena has been an NWTF borrower since 2013, and plans to recover through her agriculture business.

With your help, Elena can rebuild her house and rebound from the devastation of Super Typhoon Haiyan. In the future she would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and to pay for construction labor costs

loans.name: Meliza

texts.en:
Meliza works hard to support her family. On November 8, 2013, her business and home were wiped out by Super Typhoon Haiyan.

Meliza has restarted her business and is now requesting a PHP 9,000 housing loan through NWTF to purchase building materials and to pay for construction labor costs so that she can build a house for her family. With your help she will be able to rebuild her devastated life sooner.

In the future, Meliza would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and to pay for construction labor costs

loans.name: Mary Pilar

texts.en:
Mary Pilar is a very dedicated daughter who wants to become successful in the future. She is studying for her Bachelor of Science in Business Administration degree in a university. Her parents have a furniture buy and sell business and it helps them to sustain their living. 

Mary Pilar needs financial assistance to pay her school tuition fees for the second semester. With her GDMPC education loan, she will be able to cover the said needs and, hopefully in the future, she will find a better job according to her desire.

loans.use: to pay her school tuition fees

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en: Marcelina is a 55-year-old, married woman who lives in Guingona, Ozamiz. She is a businesswoman who sells a variety of snacks. The start up capitalization for her chosen business came from PMPC and this is how she makes her earnings for this little business. Recently, she applied for a loan to buy raw ingredients for snack vending. She wants to earn money for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for snack vending

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
Rosita is 54 years old with seven children, three of whom are in school. Rosita works very hard to provide for them.

Rosita's business and family home were destroyed by Super Typhoon Haiyan which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. Rosita has restarted her business and now needs to provide her family with a safe shelter.

Rosita has taken a PHP 9,500 housing loan through NWTF to purchase materials to rebuild her family home. She is using this loan to purchase building materials and to pay for construction labor costs.

Rosita is committed to rebuilding her devastated life, and in the future would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and to pay for construction labor costs

loans.name: Dolorosa

texts.en:
Dolorosa works hard to support her family. On November 8, 2013, her business and home were wiped out by Super Typhoon Haiyan.

Dolorosa has restarted her business and is now requesting a PHP 10,000 housing loan through NWTF to purchase building materials and to pay for construction labor costs so that she can build a house for her family. With your help she will be able to rebuild her devastated life sooner.

In the future, Dolorosa would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college and save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and to pay for construction labor costs

loans.name: Mae

texts.en:
Mae is 25 years old with four children; she works very hard to provide for them.

Mae's business and family home were destroyed by Super Typhoon Haiyan which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. Mae has restarted her business and now needs to provide her family with a safe shelter.

Mae has taken a PHP 10,000 housing loan through NWTF to purchase materials to rebuild her family home. She is using this loan to purchase building materials and to pay for construction labor costs.

Mae is committed to rebuilding her devastated life and in the future would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and to pay for construction labor costs

loans.name: Estrella

texts.en:
Estrella is 55 years old and widowed with two children; she works very hard to provide for them.

Estrella's business and family home were destroyed by super typhoon Haiyan, which swept through the Philippines on November 8, 2013. Estrella has restarted her business, and now needs to provide her family with safe shelter.

Estrella has taken a PHP 9,500 housing loan through NWTF to purchase materials to rebuild her family home.

She is using the this loan purchase for building materials and to pay for construction labor.

Estrella is committed to rebuilding her devastated life, and in future would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor

loans.name: Juan De Jesús

texts.es:
Juan de 54 años de edad, su grado académico es 3° año de primaria, debido a la distancia de la escuela no pudo avanzar en sus estudios, hoy en día esta acompañado;  su compañera de vida se dedica a los oficios domésticos, de los cuatro hijos solo dos viven con él  un varón y una hembra quienes dependen de él; pero también le ayudan a trabajar.

Su negocio esta en la agricultura, él junto a sus dos hijos se dedican al cultivo de plátano des de hace 
unos tres años, le llamo la atención por sembrar plátano porque su terreno es bastante húmedo en verano y se 
Mantiene el cultivo para que en invierno cosechar, el crédito anterior lo invirtió en sembrar 7,000 metros cuadrados.
Hoy quiere preparar otros 7,000 metros cuadrados más,  por lo que le es  necesario el apoyo económico, que es el que solicita, el cultivo lo siembra a dos kilómetros de su casa. Tomando en cuenta la distancia Juan permanece en el lugar cuidando para evitar una travesura, por lo que él y sus hijos trabajan sus seis horas diarias.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para preparar la tierra para la siembra de plátano, tiene que hacer mil setecientos hoyos,  comprar desinfectantes de la tierra, y el fertilizante que andará por 20 quintales, además invertirá en el cultivo de 7,000 metros cuadrados de maíz, es su prioridad en este año, de esa manera estará totalmente satisfecho.

En el futuro Juan desea realizar un pozo en el terreno para sembrar otro tipo de hortalizas en verano, que es cuando menos problemas de plagas se dan para lo que considera que va a necesitar ayuda de financiamiento  y también aprovechara de que sus hijos aprendan los cultivos y que en adelante se desempeñen por si solos, es su gran apuesta por que sus hijos promuevan la agricultura orgánica que es a la que también le apostaran.
texts.en:
Juan is 54 years old and has a third grade education.  He was not able to continue because of the distance of the school.  He is married now and his wife cares for the home.  Out of his four children, only one of his daughters and one of his sons live with them and still depend on him for support, but they also help him with his work.

He is a farmer  and he and his children have been raising bananas for three years.  He decided to do this because his land if very damp in the summertime and he can harvest in the winter.  He used the money from the previous loan to plan 7,000 sq. meters.

Now he wants to prepare another 7,000 square meters more and needs financial assistance.  His crops are located 2km from his home.  Considering the distance, Juan stays there to prevent mayhem.  He and his children work six hours a day.

He is asking for this loan to prepare the land to plant bananas.  He needs to dig 1,700 holes, buy disinfectants for the soil, 20 quintals of fertilizer and will also invest in raising 7,000 square meters of corn.  This is his priority for this year and he is completely satisfied with that.

In the future Juan wants to sink a well so he can plant summer vegetables, which is when he has fewer problems with blights.  He will need financial help.  He will also be able to teach his children organic farming which he is counting on.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.en: Alfredo is a Peruvian artisan who handcrafts beautiful jewelry in silver filigree. He'd like to stock up on silver as well as gemstones for his designs. Alfredo has been selling through NOVICA since 2005. This is his story. "I come from Catacao, in northern Peru. It is considered the City of Filigree. I began to learn this art when I was 11 years old, with friends who taught me little by little. I enjoy it because a jeweler's work is a delicate art. I was awarded a scholarship to study with a professor from Israel, and was offered the chance to teach filigree there. But I love Peru too much to leave." "To all of you who are helping to fund this microcredit, I'd like to express my appreciation. The truth is, I feel really energized and want to assure you my work is always crafted with quality and with much love. This loan will let me keep all my designs in stock and be able to participate in sales promotions. Gracias!" Use the link below to view Alfredo's silver filigree jewelry on the NOVICA site: http://www.novica.com/kiva/5201

loans.use: to stock up on silver as well as gemstones for his designs

loans.name: Wilson

texts.es:
Wilson es de la ciudad de Villa Elisa, está estudiando la carrera de Ingeniería en sistemas informáticos, y comenta que se inspira ya que sabe que los medios informáticos son el futuro.
Comenta también que tiene muchas ganas de poder recibirse como un profesional exitoso para poder ayudar a sus padres, ya que son ellos quienes siempre lo han apoyado, y quiere poder retribuirlos.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de universidad y también para poder cubrir sus gastos de transporte.
texts.en:
Wilson is from the city of Villa Elisa.  He is studying computer systems engineering, and he comments that he is inspired by this field since he knows that computer systems are the future.  

He comments that he also has a great desire to become a successful professional in order to help his parents, since they have always helped him and he wants to reciprocate.  

He is asking for this loan in order to pay his college tuition and also to pay for transportation expenses.

loans.use: to pay college tuition and also to pay for transportation expenses.

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
Anita is 40 years old, married and a mother of three children (two sons and one daughter).  She lives in Dhupguri in the district Jalpaiguri with her children and husband Nikunja in their own kachha house (a house which is made of bamboo, straw and mud).   

Anita's husband is a fish vendor.  He buys fish from the wholesale market and sells them in the local market. The income generated by her husband is insufficient to cover all household expenses of a five-member family.  So as an additional income, Anita has initiated her business of milk sales.  She has been doing it for the last five years and has become famous for providing good quality milk in her locality. At present she has two dairy cows and a few goats.

With an aim to further increase her business, she has asked for a loan from Kiva's partner BJS. Her plan is to utilize the loan to purchase another cow and forage for the cattle.  She hopes that with the support of the loan; she will gradually improve her business, which will ultimately help in generating more income for her family.

She dreams of building a concrete-made house for their living and she gives her thanks to the lenders for the loan.

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow and forage for milk supply business.

loans.name: Meriam

texts.en:
Meriam has been operating her own retail store for more than two years and she earns well from this. With her generated revenue, she was able to sustain their family's living. Having a big family needs more effort to provide for their needs, especially for her five children. The couple had to work hard with the determination of having a better income to provide their children with a better education that they don't have. 

To improve sales, Meriam took a new loan from GDMPC micro credit to purchase additional grocery goods to sell. In the future, Meriam hopes to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional grocery goods to sell.

loans.name: Basanti

texts.en:
Basanti is from the small village Railpara in Dhupguri in the district Jalpaiguri .  She is a woman of only 29 years, energetic, optimistic and hardworking.  She is married to Raghunath, aged 31 years.  Together they are raising three children (two sons and one daughter); one of them is a student in grade 3 and other two are too young to go to school.  Both Basanti and her husband have secondary education.

Basanti's husband is a carpenter, who makes small wooden furniture and sell it to their neighbors, but his earnings are so scanty that it is hardly possible to run the family in a decent manner.  So, Basanti is  herself engaged in the business of selling milk.  She has an animal husbandry where there is only one cow and one buffalo.  She has attained a good number of customers and has become famous for selling good quality milk.

Now, in order to earn more money she wants to expand her business.  So, she has taken a loan from BJS (Kiva's partner).  She will utilize the loan for purchasing a dairy cow and fodder, and medicine for her cattle. She hopes that this loan will be a productive one for her and will bring positive changes to her business and her family's financial situation. She desires to upgrade her cattle shed with the profit from her business. 

She is thankful to both Kiva and BJS for this loan.

loans.use: To purchase a cow, forage and medicines for the cattle.

loans.name: Laura

texts.es:
Laura es estudiante de la carrera de ciencias de la educación, y comenta que su sueño siempre fue la de ser profesora y poder enseñar a las personas que al igual que ella quieren aprender.
Comenta que viaja todos los días varios kilómetros para poder ir a la universidad y que eso es su principal desafío. Ella recibe la ayuda de sus padres, quienes la alientan a poder adelante y luchar por sus metas.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus gastos de transporte, y también poder pagar algunas cuotas de su universidad. Agradece por la oportunidad que está recibiendo de seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
Laura is an education science student. She says that it was always her dream to be a teacher and be able to teach people who want to lear, the same as she does.

She says that she travels several kilometers every day in order to go to college and that is her main challenge. she gets help from her parents, who encourage her to get ahead and fight for her goals. She is asking for this loan to invest it in paying for her transportation costs and also to pay for college tuition. She is grateful for the opportunity she is receiving to continue studying.

loans.use: to cover  transportation costs and pay for tuition.

loans.name: Victor

texts.es:
Victor está estudiando la carrera de Derecho y comenta que desea obtener su título de abogado y así ayudar a los desamparados en sus derechos y buscar soluciones favorables.
Victor es un joven muy dedicado que está estudiando y esforzándose por poder cumplir con su meta y sus sueños.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de la universidad, y de esa forma seguir luchando por cumplir con su meta.
texts.en:
Victor is studying Law and says that he wants to become a lawyer so that he can help the oppressed and look for favorable solutions for them. Victor is a dedicated young man who is studying and doing his best to achieve his goal and his dreams.

He is requesting a loan to pay for the university fees and be able to continue fighting to achieve his goal.

loans.use: to pay the university fees.

loans.name: Silvia

texts.es:
Silvia es de la ciudad de Pilar, es estudiante de la carrera de Administración de empresas, es una persona que está dedicándose por ser un profesional, útil, no solo a sí mismo, sino también a los demás. 
Cuenta que es su familia que siempre la apoya a poder seguir sus metas y luchar por ellas. Silvia quiere poder retribuir a sus padres todo lo que han hecho por ella.
Pide este préstamo ya que quiere pagar sus cuotas, ya que de esa forma cubrirá ese gasto y seguirá estudiando.
texts.en:
Silvia is from Pilar and studies Business Administration. She is fighting hard to become a useful professional, not only for her own benefit, but also for the benefit of others. She says that her family always supports her in her path to achieve her goals. Silvia wants to give something back to her parents, who have done so much for her.

She is requesting a loan to pay the university fees and be able to continue studying.

loans.use: to pay the university fees.

loans.name: Mario

texts.es:
Mario comenta que su objetivo  es graduarse en el área de salud como Licenciatura en fisioterapia y Kinesiologia.
El comenta que está estudiando esta carrera para poder ayudar a las demás personas en algo tan importante como es la salud. Es una persona que se está esforzando bastante para poder ayudar a sus seres y retribuir de esa forma a todo lo que hicieron por él.
Pide este préstamo ya que quiere poder pagar sus cuotas de estudios. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe y que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en: Mario says that his job is to graduate in healthcare with a bachelor in physiotherapy and kinesiology. He says that he is studying this major in order to help other people in something important as their health. He is a person who is striving to be able to help his loved ones and repay them for everything they have done for him. He is asking for this loan because he wants to pay for his tuition. He is thankful for the opportunity he is receiving and that it will be a big help for him.

loans.use: to pay for tuition.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
Carlos tiene 27 años, vive con su abuelo que es viudo y otros dos hermanos que ya son mayores de edad y trabajan. Su madre vive en Bs. As y le envía mensualmente una pequeña ayuda para sus gastos de estudios.
Carlos a su vez también está estudiando y trabajando al mismo tiempo, y la carrera que está siguiendo es la de Enfermería.
Él pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas, y de esa forma poder cubrir su gasto y seguir estudiando y luchando por sus metas.
texts.en: Carlos is 27 years old. He lives with his grandfather, who is a widower, and with two brothers who are grown and working. His mother works in Buenos Aires and sends him a little bit every month to help him with his education costs. Carlos is working and going to school at the same time and his major is Nursing. He is asking for this loan to be able to pay for his tuition so he can cover his costs and keep studying and fighting for his goals.

loans.use: to pay for college tuition.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
Carlos vive en casa de sus padres, está estudiando la carrera de Derecho, además está trabajando en su misma universidad. Él está desempeñándose como Auxiliar Administrativo, de aquí a un par de años su meta es recibirse, y así poder mejorar mi calidad de vida.
Su aspiración es poder llegar a ejercer mi profesión y poder ayudar a las demás personas que necesiten de su trabajo.
Hoy Carlos pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su universidad, con lo que podrá cubrir ese gasto y seguir por su meta.
texts.en:
Carlos lives with his parents, attends Law School and works at the university. He is studying to become an administrative assistant and his goal for the next 2 years is to graduate and improve his quality of life. His dream is to work in the field and to help those who might need his services. 

Carlos is requesting a loan to cover university tuition and to continue working towards his goal.

loans.use: to cover university tuition.

loans.name: Virgen De Las Mercedes De Cuyo Grande Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “VIRGEN DE LAS MERCEDES DE CUYO GRANDE”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Pisac perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Eulogia ella es conviviente y tiene 35 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta y crianza de animales y también la socia tiene un terreno donde cultiva papa y maíz y también la socia cría los cuyes y gallinas los hace crecer y engordar y luego los vende en las diferentes ferias, por medio de este pequeño negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los cuyes y gallinas. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar cuyes y gallinas y alimentos para los cuyes y gallinas.
 
 
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de animales, negocio de ganaderia, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de agricultura.




La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These are members of the communal bank "Virgen de las Mercedes de Cuyo Grande", located in the district of Pisac in the province of Calca, department of Cusco. One of the members is Eulogia, a 35-year old woman who lives with her partner and three children. She works in the business of breeding and selling animals and also cultivates potatoes and corn. Additionally, she breeds guinea pigs and hens, fatten them up and sell them in the different fairs. Thanks to this business, she can support her children. 

Her dream is to have a store where she could sell guinea pigs and hens. She is requesting a loan to buy guinea pigs and hens, as well as food for them. The remaining members work in animal sales, stockbreeding, groceries sales and agriculture. 

The member is grateful to lenders and commits to repay as scheduled.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and hens, as well as food for them.

loans.name: Himala

texts.en:
Himala is a 25-year-old housewife and mother of three school-going children, who are in grades 11, 6 and 5.  She is from the small village Baroghoria in the district Jalpaiguri. Her husband Sribas, aged 37 years, is a fish vendor, who earns very little; his earnings are not sufficient for his family.

To help her husband financially, Himala has been running  a business selling milk for the last two years. She is very motivated to provide her children a beautiful life with good education, food and clothing.  She started her business by purchasing only one cow and has improved her business gradually. Now she has one milk cow.  She sells milk to many of her neighbors along with butter that she makes from milk. Her customers are well satisfied with her product.

So Himala wants to grow her business by making more dairy products to earn more and lead a decent life.  So she applied for a loan from Kiva’s partner, BJS to purchase one more cow to expand her dairy products business.  She plans to make more dairy products such as paneer (cottage cheese), curd etc. for which there is great demand in the market.  She hopes to increase her production capacity of milk, which will help her in generating more cash with which she will be able to fulfill her dreams.

She wants to purchase a big Jersey cow in future with the profit.  She hopes her business will be a lucrative one and will secure her family's future.
She gives her thanks to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase a cow for expanding her dairy business.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan es soltero y no tiene hijos. Vive en la casa de sus padres ubicada en El Alto. Juan trabaja como contador pero ha logrado abrir  un local donde vende pizza en la ciudad donde vive. A juan le va muy bien y necesita un préstamo para ampliar el local que es alquilado, de esa manera podra vender mas pizzas Aunque Juan recibe apoyo de sus padres, no le alcanza el dinero para llevar a cabo su proyecto por eso necesita su ayuda
texts.en:
Juan is single and has no children. He lives in his parents’ house, which is located in El Alto. Juan works as a bookkeeper, but he managed to open a business where he sells pizza, located in the city where he lives.

Juan is doing well and needs a loan to enlarge the establishment he rents. This way, he will be able to sell more pizzas. Although his parents are helping him, he does not have enough money to realize his projects; this is why he is asking for help.

loans.use: to enlarge the establishment he rents, where he sells pizza.

loans.name: Narayani

texts.en:
Narayani is 30 years old and a hardworking married lady, blessed with three children (two sons and one daughter), all of whom are in school . She is a housewife who finished her primary education.   

Narayani's husband is associated with the farming business.  He grows different types of vegetables in his own land.  He sells the produce in the local market.  Narayani also helps her husband at the time of sowing and harvesting.  

Besides that, Narayani is engaged in the business of selling milk for additional income.  She has an animal husbandry where there is only one cow.  She sells milk in her locality. Narayani wants to grow her business, so she applied for a loan from Kiva’s partner, BJS, to purchase one more dairy cow for expanding her dairy business.

She is grateful to both the lenders, (BJS and Kiva).

loans.use: To buy a dairy cow for expanding her dairy business.

loans.name: Merly

texts.en:
Merly is 47 years old, married, and has six school-age children.  

She has been engaged in snack vending for seven years with a monthly income of PHP 5,000. She joined Paglaum in 2004 and applied for a loan to purchase additional ingredients for snack vending. A portion of her loan will be used to pay for labor in cultivating their land for a garden to have additional income. The profit she earns will be used to support the education of her children.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for snack vending.

loans.name: Nilima

texts.en:
Nilima is only 20 years old, married, and has only one son.  He is too young to attend school.  Nilima has a secondary education.  Her husband Mithun, aged 25 years, is a motor mechanic and works in a garage. They live in the small village Baroghoria in Jalpaiguri in their own house.

Nilima's husband earns so little that it is quite impossible to run the family with his income. Nilima is an ambitious and dedicated lady who concretely knows what she wants and goes after it with all her strength. She knows how to appropriately use and manage her finances in order to achieve her desired goals.  As the main source of income for her family, she practices livestock breeding.  She started the business only two years ago with an initial purchase of one dairy cow. She currently has two cows.  She sells the milk in her locality.

For further development of her business, Nilima has taken a loan from BJS to purchase one more cow, so that she can earn enough profit to live a decent life with her husband and son.

She has also been planning for a long time to save money for her son's education and build a concrete-made house to live in.  That's why she gives her heartiest thanks to Kiva and BJS for making her dreams come true.

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow for her milk supply business.

loans.name: Omar

texts.es: El señor Omar de 34 años de edad se caracteriza por ser una persona trabajadora y responsable, es maestro carpintero y realiza sus actividades en Monteagudo, tiene dos dependientes de sus ingresos y ya no convive con su conyugue de la cual se separó hace un tiempo,  vive en domicilio propio y comparte la vivienda con su madre y sus dos hermanos, su actividad  la realiza  durante todo el año, trabaja arduamente para cubrir los gastos de alimentación, ropa y servicios básicos de sus hijas y otros gastos en los que incurren en su hogar. Actualmente requiere un crédito para adquirir materia prima para su carpintería de forma que le sirva para cumplir con sus demandas de trabajo y cubrir otros gastos de la actividad económica, el señor es una persona responsable y toma su trabajo con mucha seriedad, desea mejorar  económicamente para proporcionarle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida y mayor bienestar.
texts.en:
Omar is a 34-year old hard-working and responsible man who works as a carpenter in Monteagudo. He separated from his partner some time ago, but has two children who depend on him. He lives in his own house with his mother and two siblings. He works hard all year round to cover household expenses, including food, clothing and basic services for her daughters. 

He is currently requesting a loan to buy materials for his carpentry so that he can meet the demand and cover business expenses. He is very responsible and takes his job very seriously. His goal is to improve his financial situation and to provide his family with better life conditions and well being.

loans.use: to buy materials for his carpentry business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to repair a fridge for her business, as well as to buy supplies and ingredients to prepare the food she sells.

loans.name: Judith

texts.es: La señora Judith de 41 años de edad vive en el municipio de Monteagudo, en  domicilio en  anticrético, su actividad de la cliente es la preparación de productos de repostería y la confección de ropa de vestir  de las cuales genera sus ingresos,  tiene dos hijos dependientes, uno cursa el nivel secundario y el otro cursa el nivel primario, la señora es muy responsable con sus actividades. Dado que no tiene mucho dinero actualmente solicita un crédito que lo destinara para la compra de un horno industrial y la adquisición de una heladera mostrador donde expondrá sus productos con el fin de mejorar y ampliar su negocio para que así produzca mayores cantidades y de distintas variedades que le permitan satisfacer todas las demandas de su clientela y por consiguiente mejorara sus ingresos y crecerá tanto en lo económico, personal como profesional en la preparación de productos de repostería.
texts.en:
Judith, 41, lives in the municipality of Monteagudo. She has a home with an "anticrético" agreement, in which tenants pay a fixed deposit to the owner upon moving in rather than paying monthly rent. Her business activities are preparing baked goods and making clothing. She earns an income from these activities. She has two dependent children. One is studying at primary school and one is in high school. She is very responsible with her activities. 

Since she does not have much money at the moment, she is applying for a loan to buy an industrial oven and a refrigerated display counter where she will display her products. Her goal is to improve and expand her business so that she can produce a greater quantity and variety of products to satisfy her clients' demand. She will then improve her income and grow financially, personally and professionally in her baking.

loans.use: to buy an industrial oven and a refrigerated display counter.

loans.name: Dorica

texts.en:
Dorica is 62 years old and lives in Paglaum Dumalinao ZDS. She is married and has five children.

She has a stall where she sells goods and dry goods. She had this business for six years. She requested a loan to buy goods and dry goods for her sari-sari store.

She has been a member of PMPC for six years. In the future Dorica hopes to build a general store in her town.

loans.use: To buy goods and dry goods for her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Chuluuntsetseg

texts.en:
Chuluuntsetseg, 47 years old, lives with her daughter, son-in-law and granddaughter in an old house in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. She has been working as a bookkeeper at a private firm since 2008. Her son-in-law renders taxi service to local people for a living. Her daughter stays at home looking after her granddaughter.

She is requesting a loan of 1,100 USD to buy planks, cement, paints and fiberglass for house renovation. After renovation, her family will live in a comfortable and warm place where less coal is burned and fewer pollutants are released into the air.

loans.use: to buy planks, cement, paints and fiberglass.

loans.name: Pedro  Adalberto

texts.es: El Sr. Pedro Adalberto es director de una escuela publica rural de nicaragua donde asisten niños de entre 10 y 14 años desde hace 24 años padre de tres hijos, el Sr Pedro Adalberto, con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio a ido contruyendo poco a poco su casa de habitacion, este credito lo necesita para hacerle unas mejoras a su casa de habitacion y prepararce para la entrada  de la temporada del invierno, brindandole a su familia una mejor calidad de de vida.
texts.en:
Pedro Adalberto is the director of a rural public school in Nicaragua, where kids between 10 and 14 years old have been attending for 24 years. Pedro Adalberto has three children and has built his own house little by little with a lot of hard work and sacrifice. 

He needs the loan to make some improvements to his house and to get ready for the winter season, so that he can provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn, a mother of one child, buys and sells cosmetics to make a living. For three years, she has earned well to provide and sustain their daily living. 

She plans to improve her business in order to provide her child a better education, so recently, she took a new loan from GDMPC micro credit to purchase more beauty products for sale to have higher returns. 

In the future, she wants to provide a better living to her child and improve the business to ensure a better source of income.

loans.use: to purchase more beauty products for sale.

loans.name: Lizel

texts.en:
Lizel is one step from her new life's journey. She lives in Villaflor, Oroquieta City with her family. She used to help her parents with their household chores to lighten their burden of work. She used her previous loan to pay her school tuition. 

She has recently requested a new loan  from Gata Daku Multi-purpose Cooperative to pay her graduation fees. She hopes to be given a chance to land a job to help  her family in the near future.

loans.use: to pay her graduation fees

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es: La señora Cristina de 26 años de edad, está casada con el señor Segundino, viven en la zona sud de la ciudad de Cochabamba, donde existen muchos talleres de costura, ella tiene un grado de instrucción de nivel técnico y su esposo cuenta con un grado de instrucción de nivel bachillerato, ambos tienen 2  hijos dependientes de sus ingresos.  La principal actividad  de la señora es el servicio de confección de prendas de vestir (principalmente polleras) con experiencia de 4 años. Ella ingreso a estudiar  a unos cursos de capacitación de carreras técnicas para obtener un título profesional y poder defenderse en la vida, con ese certificado puede trabajar en distintas empresas de costura, pero decidió emprender con su pequeño taller donde confecciona polleras de 3 y 4 paños. El destino del crédito es para la compra de insumos y máquina de confección para continuar con su emprendimiento y  mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Cristina, 26, is married to Segundino. They live in the south of Cochabamba, where there are many sewing workshops. She has a technical degree and her husband has a high school degree. They have two children who are dependent on their income. 

Her main business activity is making clothing (mainly traditional Andean skirts). She has four years of experience. She enrolled in technical training courses to get a professional degree title and to be able to support herself. With this certificate, she can work in many sewing companies, but she decided to start up her own small workshop where she makes traditional skirts with three or four layers. She will use this loan to buy supplies and a sewing machine to continue with her business and improve her income.

loans.use: to buy supplies and a sewing machine.

loans.name: Dorjzodov

texts.en:
Mr.Dorjzodov is a 38-year-old borrower from Arkhangai province, Mongolia. He and his wife have been running organic dairy product sales since 2004. His 2 children attend local school.

Dorjzodov is starting a new business of clothes trade around the countryside. He is providing a mobile service around remote administrative units within the province and trading clothing for raw cashmere or other raw materials from herders. He is now requesting a loan of 5,000,000 MNT to purchase a large amount of clothing inventory to deliver to remote areas for trade with raw materials. Dorjzodov is a hardworking and diligent man.

loans.use: to purchase large amounts of clothing inventory to deliver to remote areas for trade

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce  has been operating her own general store for more than 12 years and she earns a good income from this work. With her generated revenue, she was able to repay her previous loan successfully. She had to work hard, with determination to have a higher income to provide her children with a better education. 

To improve sales, she has taken a new loan from Gata Daku Multi-purpose Cooperative to purchase additional grocery goods to sell. In the future, Joyce hopes to improve her family's general living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase additional grocery goods to sell

loans.name: Sima

texts.en:
Sima is a 36-year-old woman from the remote village Khalpara in the district Jalpaiguri.  She is married and a mother of two sweet daughters.  She lives happily with her daughters and husband Sujit in their own house.  Sima has a higher secondary education whereas her husband studied up to grade 10.  Both could not go ahead with their studies due to their parents' poor economic situation.  Their daughters are in grade 9 and grade 1.

Sima is a housewife but her husband owns a clothing shop in the market where he sells mainly ladies' garments like sarees (Indian traditional ladies' wear), frocks etc. This garment shop is the only source of income for his family, which is the reason he devotes all of his time to the garment shop.  His shop is situated in the main market and there are a lot of competitors in the market.  Due to this competition, it is very difficult to convince customers to pay a high price.  He has to keep the latest designs, rates and delightful colors in the shop so that he can maintain the rate of sales. Now the major problem is that he does not have sufficient capital to buy clothing.

Sima has come forward to help her husband.  She has applied for a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to purchase clothing as he wants, so that her husband can cope with the market competition and generate sufficient income to look after his family well. Sima is ready enough to get involved in this business.

Sima wants to expand this business for their secure future.

She thanks Kiva and BJS for this support.

loans.use: To purchase clothing for her husband's existing business.

loans.name: Leah

texts.en:
Leah has provided transportation services in her community for many years, with the help of her husband.  She earns a good living and it is her main source of income. 

Leah toohttps://partners.kiva.org/img/w623/1597190.jpgk a new loan from GDMPC micro credit to maintain her motor cab. In the future, she wants to save her profits formretirement.

loans.use: to pay for motor cab maintenance.

loans.name: Luzminda

texts.en:
Luzminda is a married entrepreneur who runs a general store in their village, to make a living.  Her husband fishes for a living.. 

For more than three years she has earned enough money to support her husband and sustain their living.  Luzminda needs to buy additional grocery goods to increase sales.  

With the micro finance loanfromGDMPC, her plan was realized. In the future, she wants to acquire a new motorcycle to help transport stock. Luzminda wants to improve the living situation of her entire family.

loans.use: to buy grocery goods.

loans.name: Iris

texts.en:
Gemalyn is single she lives in Misamis Occidental with her parents.  

She runs a general store selling goods in her local community to earn a living.  Gemalynhas has run her business for three years. 

She borrowed a loan from GDMPC micro credit to buy canned goods, noodles and spices.

Gemalyn plans to expand her store to gain more income, to improve her living situation..

loans.use: to buy canned goods, noodles and spices to stock her store.

loans.name: Abha

texts.en:
Abha is a 46-year-old housewife from the remote village Vivekananda Para in Jalpaiguri district.  She is married to Goutam, who is associated with a small business. They have only one son who is pursuing higher education.  They live in their own concrete-made house.

Abha's husband has a very small income from his business. He works hard the whole day for their family, but his income is insufficient for their household.  In order to help her husband, Abha wants to start a business making incense sticks. It is a very profitable business in her area and it also does not involve much labour cost.

Abha has applied for a loan from BJS ( Kiva's partner) to start her incense-making business.  She wants to purchase raw materials.  She will sell them at the market as well as door to door to her neighbors for more profit. There is a high demand for this product in her locality.  She hopes it will improve the family's financial condition. She wants to further increase her business.

She is grateful to both BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase necessary ingredients for incense-making business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy construction materials such as zinc sheets and rafters to repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en:
Teresa is 35 years of age, married to a farmer and blessed with three children. Her eldest child goes to school while the other two are still infants. 

Teresa has been engaged in a direct selling business for 4 months and a home service manicure and pedicure business for 4 years. Teresa started her manicure and pedicure business with a capital of 5,000 PHP. Whenever she performs home service, she brings her brochures of AVON, MSE and NATASHA to show it to her customers. 

Teresa would like to ask for financial assistance amounting to 5,000 PHP. She will use this loan amount to buy shoes, blouses and dresses for her direct selling business and different colors of nail polish for her beauty salon business. She hopes that through this amount of loan, she will be able to let her three children finish their studies and sustain their daily needs.

In the business picture, the borrower wears a yellow blouse, while the other one is her customer.

loans.use: to purchase shoes, blouses and dresses for her direct selling business and different colors of nail polish for her beauty salon business

loans.name: Marieta

texts.en:
Marieta manages a variety store, raises hogs and a farming business.  She is now 53 years of age, separated, and has three children.

Marieta is an ex-abroad and came back to the Philippines where she decided to stay in her own village and run her businesses.

Now, Marieta offers computer games and videos for rent as additional source of income.  She aims to have a grocery someday; that's the reason why she's doing her best to improve her sales and satisfy her costumers demands.

Now, she plans to purchase more grocery items, but her capital is not enough.  For this reason, Marieta is seeking a loan of PHP13,000 to buy cases of soft drinks, frozen foods, canned goods and ice cream to sell.

She hopes that lenders will grant her requested loan.

loans.use: to purchase of grocery items to sell.

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet is a hardworking 18 year old lady. She was studying Hotel and Restaurant Services at university.
.
Juliet's parents have 10 dependent and she is someone who is very dedicated to her studies and she loves her family.  Her father worked as a carpenter.
.
Juliet is requesting a loan to pay the balances of her tuition fees for the second semester. 
    
Her goal is to finish her studies and to fine a better career to earn more income.  In the future, Juliet wants to become successful.

loans.use: to pay university tuition fees for the second semester.

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
Anita, 50, is married and lives in Bangkal Aguada, Ozamiz City. She supports her family through buying and selling ready-to-wear clothing. She got the start-up capital for her business from Paglaum Multi-purpose Cooperative. She earns a good income from her buying and selling business. 

Recently, she requested a loan from the cooperative to buy materials for house repair. She wishes to live comfortably with a good roof on the family's home.

loans.use: to buy materials for house repair

loans.name: Sherry

texts.en:
Sherry is a 37-year-old married man. He earns his living in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines and lives with his three children.

For over ten years, Sherry has been able to met the needs of his family by covering his family's day-to-day expenditures and save for future needs.

Recently, he took a new loan to cover his motorcycle maintenance costs.  Sherry expects to increase his income and improve the general living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to cover motorcycle maintenance costs.

loans.name: Nena Rizzi

texts.en:
Nena Rizzi earns a living from the salary of her husband from working.  Nena Rizzi wants to purchase a piece of land used for farming. 

Without hesitation, Nena Rizzi took a loan from GDMPC micro credit to purchase the farm land.  She hopes to earn more returns in order to generate additional income for the purpose of acquiring more farm land..

loans.use: to purchase a farm.

loans.name: Pearl Danica

texts.en:
Pearl Danica is someone who is very dedicated to her studies and wants to become successful in her career.  She studied Hotel and Restaurant Services  and her ambition is to work abroad. 

Pearl Danica is requesting this loan to pay the balances of her school tuition fees for the second semester. Her goal is to have a better life and career in the future.

loans.use: to pay school tuition fees for the second semester.

loans.name: Laily

texts.en:
Laily is a 56-year-old woman who is a housewife.  She lives in the small village Magurmari in the district Jalpaiguri with her husband and one son. Both Laily and her husband are illiterate and can only sign their names.  Laily's husband has grown old and feeble, so he is unable to do any work.  Her son is associated with a car repair business and earns for the family.  He is the only breadwinner for the family. Unfortunately he was deprived of an education due to their poverty and now contributes towards family's expenses by driving and repairing cars.

Laily's son has a small motor repair shop.  He has been working as a motor mechanic for the last 10 years.  He started this business to increase the income for his family. It was an impressive step forward for his family's well-being but now he is not able to give a better life to his family. So he needs to expand his business by purchasing more motor spare parts.

Laily has taken an initiative to help her son.  She has taken out a loan from BJS ( Kiva's partner).  They want to use the loan to purchase more motor spare parts.  She hopes that she will be capable of developing her family business and can generate more income to give a better life to her family.

She gives her heartiest thanks to the lenders for making her family happy.

loans.use: To purchase spare parts for their existing car repair business.

loans.name: Minu

texts.en:
Minu is a young married woman of 39 years. She has two children (one son and one daughter), who are students in grade 10 and 8.  Her husband, Tapan, is a farmer.  They live in the village Baroghoria in the district Jalpaiguri.

Minu's husband has been growing vegetables for many years; it is the means of sustenance for the household. The challenges found in this work are the various pests, changes in climate, etc. Minu’s husband works hard all day long in the various farm activities and Minu is responsible for the house, preparing food and caring for the children.

Now Minu is applying for economic support from BJS as they have decided to cultivate jute in their farmland for additional income.  She will purchase agricultural supplies such as fertilizers, pesticides and jute seeds. They hope it will give them good earnings as jute is a very profitable crop. The future of her children and her family depend on the work and development in the business.

Her full thanks go to BJS and Kiva for this financial help.

loans.use: To purchase agricultural supplies such as fertilizers, pesticides and jute seeds for cultivation.

loans.name: Dulguun

texts.en:
Dulguun, age 31 is a single man living in a rental apartment in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. 

He works asa  driver for a cable television company.  During his day off he renders taxi services to local people for extra income. 

His mother lives alone in the countryside and each month he travels there and visits her and gives money to live. 

He is requesting a loan of $1650 to renovate an old house he has recently bought.  After renovation, he wants to bring his mother to Ulaanbaatar and live together because she is getting older each day. 

Dulguun is a very hardworking individual who is very concerned about his mother's well being.

loans.use: to renovate his old house.

loans.name: Badamgarav

texts.en:
Badamgarav, 49, lives with her husband and son in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia.  She has sold thread, fabric and buttons used for dressmaking, to local people since 2001. 

Her husband is taxi driver.  Currently their daughter studies at Korean university and their son has a disability and stays at home. 

Badamgarav is requesting a loan of $2800 to buy building materials such as bricks, planks and fiberglass for her house renovation project. 

After renovation, her family will live in a comfortable and warm place where less coal is burned for heating thus reducing air pollution, by emitting less smoke.

loans.use: to renovate her house.

loans.name: Dúo Lomas De San Cristobal Group

texts.es: Dúo Lomas de San Cristobal este Dúo esta conformado por la señora Valentina de 38 años de edad ella se ha dedica a la elaboracion y venta de tortillas, se ha dedica a esta  actividda desde hace varios años ya que es una actividad que le a proporcionado el sustento para su familia, en esta oportunidad esta solicitando este credito para la compra de mai y leña para segui creciendo en su negocio.
texts.en:
Valentina, 38 years old is part of the Lomas de San Cristobal Duo. She has worked making and selling tortillas for several years, and it has provided sustenance for her family.

Now she is requesting this loan to buy corn and firewood to continue growing her business.

loans.use: to buy corn and firewood to make tortillas to sell

loans.name: Adeluz

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Adeluz;la socia continua dedicándose al negocio de llamadas telefonicas,la socia realiza estas llamadas de forma ambulatoria para todos sus clientes que solicitan sus servicios, la socia continua realizando llamadas nacionales i locales, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de un nuevo celular.
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member is Adeluz. She continues working in the telephone call business. She works as a street vendor for the customers who require her services. She still makes national and local calls. The member wants to continue working in her business and by this continue to be able to support her family.

The member will invest the loan in the purchase of a new cell phone. She is happy about the loan and promises to make her payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy a new cell phone.

loans.name: Sol Radiante -Wimpillay Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SOL RADIANTE -WIMPILLAY”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

Irma tiene 65 años de edad y vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco, ella es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene siete hijos, ella nació en el departamento de Apurimac pero vive en la encantadora ciudad del Cusco. Ella se dedica a la venta de plantas en una feria sabatina en la ciudad del Cusco, ella de lunes a viernes cultiva diferentes tipos de plantas en su terreno. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar abano y semillas. Irma esta levantado la mano en la fotografía. 

La socia que aparece en la parte inferior de la fotografía llego después de la reunión. 
 
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de restaurante, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de transporte.
texts.en:
These members are part of the communal borrowing group "Sol Radiante -Wimpillay." This group is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco in the department of Cusco. 

Irma is 65 years old and lives in the beautiful city of Cusco. She is married and, as fruit of this beautiful relationship, she has seven children. She was born in the deparment of Apurimac but lives in the charming city of Cusco. She works selling plants in a Saturday fair in the city of Cusco, and from Monday to Friday she grows different types of plants on her land. Now she needs a loan to buy compost and seeds. Irma is raising her hand in the photograph.

The member shown in the lower part of the photograph arrived after the meeting.

The other members work selling clothing, in the restaurant business, in the grocery store business and in the business of transport.

loans.use: to buy compost and seeds

loans.name: Belina

texts.en:
Belina is 39 years old and married to a farmer,.  They are blessed with three children and live in rural community. 

Despite their financial hardship, she and her husband aim to educate their children and give them a better living.  With this in mind, they work together to plant and harvest rice and vegetables for sale. 

They plan to expand their vegetable plantation to ensure higher production.  Having inadequate capital, Belina is requesting for a loan of PHP16,000.00 to buy certified seeds, fertilizers and herbicides needed in vegetable production. 

Through patience and hard work, Belina believes that they will be able to improve their farming business.

loans.use: to buy certified seeds, fertilizers and herbicides needed in vegetable production.

loans.name: Shahid

texts.en:
Shahid is 44 years-old married man who lives with his six children and spouse near Lahore, Pakistan. 

He has been troubleshooting electrical water pumps; his practice to buy scrap water pumps at low prices and after binding the motors, sells them for higher prices.  To bind the motors; Shahid required copper wires in large quanties, which is very expensive.

He also wants to buy additional electrical goods to sell from his store. 

He contacted Kiva's field partner BRAC Pakistan to buy copper cable coils, used water pumps and electrical goods for reselling. 

Shahid hopes that Kiva lenders will support him.  He is very thankful to Kiva, Kiva's lenders and field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy copper wire coils, use water pumps and electrical goods.

loans.name: Enkhjargal

texts.en:
Enkhjargall is a 26 years old woman who lives with her husband and two children in Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. 

She has been working as therapist at a local hospital since 2011.  Her husband transports goods between districts for a living. They live in a ger (a portable felt dwelling) on a plot of land. 

Enkhjargall is requesting a loan of $3000 to buy building materials, such as bricks, cements, planks and fiberglass for building a barn next to their ger. 

Building a barn next to her ger will decrease heat loss, reducing coal usage.  The burning of coal is considered the foremost contributor of air pollution, according to state research department.

loans.use: to buy building materials to build a barn.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es: Luis es soltero, no tiene hijos y vive con su mamá en la ciudad de La Paz, en una casa de adobe que le pertenece a su madre. La vivienda tiene un defecto y es que esta situada al pie de un cerro. Luis necesita credito para comprar una guitarra electrica para poder fletarla en eventos, Luis se dedica al flete de instrumentos y esta ampliando su negocio Luis recibe ayuda de su madre pero la renta de jubilada de ella no es suficiente asi que no exageramos al decir que Luis es la principal fuente de ingresos de sus hogar.
texts.en: Luis is single, he has no children and lives with his mother in the city of La Paz, in a house made of adobe that belongs to his mother. The house has an issue: it is located at the bottom of a hill. Luis needs a loan to buy an electric guitar so that he can rent it out for events. Luis rents instruments for a living and he is expanding his business. Luis gets help from his mother, but her pension is not enough, so we do not exaggerate in saying that Luis is the main source of income for their home.

loans.use: to buy an electric guitar for his instrument rental business

loans.name: Ulziikhutag

texts.en: Mr. Ulziikhutag, 42 years old, lives with his wife and four children in Darkhan, second largest city of Mongolia. He has been selling everyday consumer goods to local people for more than twenty years. His wife is a teacher and works at a high school. He is requesting a loan of 3,000 USD to buy inventory such as dishes, cups and also vitamins in large amounts from China, so he can run his business without worrying about inventory shortage. He is a very hardworking and polite person and his customers are happy with his service.

loans.use: to buy consumer goods such as dishes, cups, and also vitamins for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to start his premium quality rice supply business.

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es: Manuel es soltero pero tiene dos hijos, Manuel vive con su madre en La Paz en una casa de acabado fino donde paga un alquiler. Manuel trabaja como chofer hasta altas horas de la noche y corre peligro de ser asaltado. Manuel necesita un credito para pagar gastos medicos de su madre que tiene un problema en la matriz Manuel tiene muchas obligaciones por eso necesita que lo ayuden
texts.en:
Manuel is single, but he has two children. He lives with his mother in La Paz, in a well-finished house they rent. Manuel works as a driver until late at night, which means he can be robbed anytime.

Manuel is requesting a loan to pay for his mother’s medical expenses. She has a uterine condition. Manuel has many responsibilities and this is why he needs some help.

loans.use: to pay for his mother's medical expenses.

loans.name: Dúo La Bonita Group

texts.es: Dúo la Bonita este grupo esta conformado por la señora Vicenta de 56 años de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de refacciones desde hace varios años, en esta oportunidad ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de mercaderia para la elaboracion y venta de refacciones esperado que nuevamente la puedan ayudar con el credito solicitado.
texts.en: Vicenta is one of the members of the "Dúo la Bonita" group. She has sold refreshments for several years. At this time she is requesting a loan to buy merchandise to make and sell refreshments. She hopes that once again you can help her with this loan.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to prepare and sell refreshments.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca is 53 years old and widowed. She lives in a rural community and manages a retail store in the public market. She has been in the business for almost six years. She aims to become successful and financially stable in order to help in financing the education of her niece and nephews. 

In this regard, she wants to improve and expand her business in order to increase her income. Due to insufficient capital, she is asking for a loan of PHP 30,000 to buy additional stocks of school supplies, grocery items, rice and frozen foods to resell. She is hoping that she will access her loan request to be able to improve the business.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of school supplies, grocery items, rice and frozen foods to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy the products of the basic family basket to sell in her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
